Package io.micronaut.guides.core

Class GuideGenerationUtils

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.guides.core.GuideGenerationUtils
public final class GuideGenerationUtils extends Object
Utility class for generating paths and options for guides. This class provides methods to generate paths for main and test files, resolve JDK versions, and process guide metadata.

    • process

      public static boolean process(Guide metadata, boolean checkJdk, GuidesConfiguration guidesConfiguration)
      Checks whether a guide should be processed a guide based on the given metadata, JDK check flag, and guides configuration.
      Parameters:
      metadata - the guide metadata to consider
      checkJdk - whether to check the JDK version
      guidesConfiguration - the guides configuration to use
      Returns:
      true if the guide should be processed, false otherwise
